column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the poem The City of the Gods.
* 1941 - Voice actor Sean Arnold is born.
* 1952 - Brazilian translator Ronald Kyrmse is born.
* 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Stanley Unwin.
* 1995 - Voice actor Michael Graham Cox dies.
* 2003 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography (Greenwood Biographies) by Leslie Ellen Jones is published.
* 2005 - The Forsaken Realm of Tolkien is published.
* 2005 - Interrupted Music: The Making of Tolkiens Mythology is published.
* 2011 - Tolkien and Wales by Carl Phelpstead was published.
* 2018 - Poetry and Song in the works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
:There are no known events for this day.Category:Datesfi:30. huhtikuuta
